plugin.name: twitter-checker
plugin.author: Alberto Vilches
plugin.title: Twitter checker Plugin (followers, timeline, mentions and RTs checker)
plugin.description: Uses the Twitter4J api (with OAuth) to periodically check (using Quartz) for new followers and unfollows, and trigger events to send emails/direct messages or whatever you want. Checks your timeline, mentions to you and RTs of you, and show it in your site with a very simple TagLib.
